definition: (fencing) a counterattack made immediately after successfully parrying the opponents lunge, answer back
details:
noun
- (fencing) a counterattack made immediately after successfully parrying the opponents lunge
- a quick reply to a question or remark (especially a witty or critical one)
= synonyms: return
verb
- answer back
= synonyms: return
- make a return thrust
= example: make a return thrust
